metadata.title: CVE-2017-8843 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The join_pthread function in stream.c in liblrzip.so in lrzip 0.631 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference andapplication crash) via a crafted archive.

criterions.comment: lrzip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
